AT.name: Chase-Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~
AT.description: Chase: Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~ ist ein Adventure-Mystery-Game, das dem kreativen Kopf Taisuke Kanasakis entsprungen ist, dem Director des berühmten Hotel Dusk: Room 215! Verfolge die Abenteuer zweier mutiger Detektive, deren Gerechtigkeitssinn und purer Instinkt sie dazu treibt, die Wahrheit herauszufinden. Stelle deine Spürnase auf die Probe, indem du an alten Tatorten neue Ermittlungen anstellst und ungeklärte Fälle wieder neu aufrollst, neue Spuren suchst und Verdächtige befragst! Finde Hinweise, indem du dich kopfüber in alte Ermittlungsnotizen, Tatortfotos und Augenzeugenberichte stürzt und alle Teile des Puzzles zusammenfügst. Sobald du stichhaltige Hinweise hast, kannst du relevante Personen verhören und herausfinden, was sie (oder was sie nicht) wissen. Zermürbe Verdächtige mit deinen Fragen, aber pass auf! Wenn du die falschen stellst, wird dein Verhörpegel aufgebraucht. Stellst du gar zu viele falsche Fragen, heißt es für dich Game Over!

AU.name: Chase-Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~
AU.description: Chase: Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~ is an adventure mystery game from the mind of Taisuke Kanasaki, director of the famed Hotel Dusk: Room 215! Join the exploits of two gritty detectives whose sense of justice and raw instinct drive them to seek the truth. Put your sleuthing skills to the challenge by re-investigating old crime scenes and solving cold cases by searching for clues and interrogating perps! Find leads by diving head first into old investigation notes, crime scene photos and eye witness reports as you put together all the pieces. Once you have a solid lead, interrogate persons of interest to see what they do (or don't) know. Grill perps by asking tough questions, but be careful! Ask the wrong questions and your Interrogation Gauge will deplete. Ask too many wrong questions and it's Game Over!

BG.name: Chase-Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~
BG.description: Chase: Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~ is an adventure mystery game from the mind of Taisuke Kanasaki, director of the famed Hotel Dusk: Room 215! Ask the wrong questions and your Interrogation Gauge will deplete. Ask too many wrong questions and it's Game Over!

BE.name: Chase-Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~
BE.description: Chase: Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~ est un jeu d'aventure enveloppé de mystères sorti tout droit de l'imagination de Taisuke Kanasaki, concepteur du fameux Hotel Dusk: Room 215 ! Rejoignez deux inspecteurs bruts de décoffrage que le sens de la justice et l'instinct poussent à rechercher la vérité. Mettez vos talents de détective à rude épreuve et réexaminez d'anciennes scènes de crime pour résoudre des affaires classées. Guettez le moindre indice et interrogez le moindre suspect ! Découvrez des pistes qui vous replongeront dans les notes d'enquête, les photos des scènes de crime et les rapports de témoin pour rassembler les pièces du puzzle. Lorsque vous aurez une piste sûre, interrogez les suspects pour découvrir ce qu'ils savent (ou ne savent pas). Cuisinez-les avec vos questions, mais prenez garde ! Si vous posez les mauvaises questions, votre jauge d'interrogation se videra. Et si vous posez trop de mauvaises questions, la partie sera terminée !

ES.name: Chase-Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~
ES.description: ¡Chase: Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~ es un juego de aventura y misterio creado por Taisuke Kanasaki, director del afamado título Hotel Dusk: Room 215! Únete a las aventuras de dos osados detectives cuyo sentido de la justicia y su instinto los llevan a buscar la verdad. ¡Pon a prueba tus habilidades detectivescas volviendo a investigar antiguas escenas de crímenes y resolviendo casos buscando pistas e interrogando a los sospechosos! Descubre pistas sumergiéndote en las antiguas notas de la investigación, en las fotos de la escena del crimen y en los informes de testigos, mientras vas encajando todas las piezas. Cuando tengas una pista sólida, interroga a gente interesante para ver qué es lo que saben (y lo que no). Bombardea a los sospechosos con preguntas duras, ¡pero con cuidado! ¡Si preguntas lo que no toca, se vaciará tu indicador de interrogatorios, y si haces demasiadas preguntas inadecuadas se acabará la partida!

IT.name: Chase-Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~
IT.description: Chase: Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~ è un gioco thriller a tinte mystery ideato da Taisuke Kanasaki, creatore del celebre Hotel Dusk: Room 215! Partecipa alle indagini di due burberi detective che ricercano la verità guidati dal proprio senso di giustizia e dal puro istinto. Metti alla prova il tuo intuito, torna a investigare su vecchie scene del crimine e risolvi casi irrisolti cercando indizi e interrogando criminali! Rispolvera vecchi rapporti d'indagine, fotografie e testimonianze per trovare nuove piste e mettere insieme tutti i pezzi di un puzzle irrisolto. Quando avrai una pista solida, interroga le persone giuste per scoprire ciò che sanno (o non sanno). Torchia i criminali mettendoli spalle al muro, ma attenzione: facendo le domande sbagliate, la tua Barra Interrogatorio si svuoterà... Se commetterai troppi errori, il gioco finirà!

NL.name: Chase-Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~
NL.description: Chase: Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~ is een avonturenspel vanuit de gedachten van Taisuke Kanasaki, de directeur van het beroemde Hotel Dusk: Room 215! Voeg je bij twee moedige detectives waarvan het gevoel voor gerechtigheid en pure instinct ze ertoe heeft aangedreven om achter de waarheid te komen. Breng je speurvaardigheden in de praktijk en onderzoek oude crime scenes en cold cases door naar aanwijzingen te zoeken en mensen te ondervragen! Vind aanwijzingen door helemaal in oude onderzoeksnotities, foto's van het plaats delict en rapporten van ooggetuigen te duiken om alle puzzelstukjes in elkaar te passen. Zodra je een goede rode draad te pakken hebt, ondervraag je interessante personen om te zien wat zij wel of niet weten. Stel ze lastige vragen, maar let op! Stel de verkeerde vragen en je verhoormeter zal leeg raken. Stel te veel vragen en het spel is game over!

NZ.name: Chase-Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~
NZ.description: Chase: Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~ is an adventure mystery game from the mind of Taisuke Kanasaki, director of the famed Hotel Dusk: Room 215! Put your sleuthing skills to the challenge by re-investigating old crime scenes and solving cold cases by searching for clues and interrogating perps! Join the exploits of two gritty detectives whose sense of justice and raw instinct drive them to seek the truth. Put your sleuthing skills to the challenge by re-investigating old crime scenes and solving cold cases by searching for clues and interrogating perps! Find leads by diving head first into old investigation notes, crime scene photos and eye witness reports as you put together all the pieces. Once you have a solid lead, interrogate persons of interest to see what they do (or don't) know. Grill perps by asking tough questions, but be careful! Ask the wrong questions and your Interrogation Gauge will deplete. Ask too many wrong questions and it's Game Over!

PT.name: Chase-Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~
PT.description: Chase: Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~ é um jogo de aventura e mistério da mente de Taisuke Kanasaki, criador do famoso Hotel Dusk: Room 215! Junta-te às aventuras de dois detetives duros, cujo sentido de justiça e instituto puro os impele a encontrar a verdade. Coloca à prova os teus dotes de detetive, voltando a investigar antigas cenas de crime e resolvendo casos arquivados, procurando pistas e interrogando os criminosos! Para encontrares pistas, analisa primeiro as antigas notas da investigação, fotografias da cena do crime e relatos de testemunhas oculares para juntares todas as peças do puzzle. Quando tiveres uma pista sólida, interroga as pessoas de interesse para ver o que sabem ou não sabem. No interrogatório, não sejas meigo, mas tem cuidado! Se fizeres as perguntas erradas, gastas o teu Indicador de Interrogatório. Se fizeres demasiadas perguntas erradas, perdes o jogo!

RU.name: Chase-Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~
RU.description: Chase: Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~ – это приключенческая детективная игра от Тайсуке Канасаки, создателя знаменитой игры Hotel Dusk: Room 215! Присоединитесь к расследованию, проводимую двумя детективами, чью чувство справедливости побуждает их искать истину. Используйте все свои детективные навыки, чтобы повторно расследовать старое преступление и решить нераскрытые дела путем поиска улик и допроса правонарушителей! Ищите зацепки, погружаясь в записи старого расследования, фотографии с места преступления и свидетельские показания, сводя разные кусочки в единую картину. Как только у вас появится веская улика, допросите нужных лиц, чтобы понять, что они знают (или не знают). Допрашивайте виновных с пристрастием, задавая им трудные вопросы, но не переусердствуйте! Если будете задавать неподходящие вопросы, ваш счетчик допроса будет уменьшаться. Зададите слишком много неуместных вопросов – и игра окончена!

SE.name: Chase-Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~
SE.description: Chase: Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~ is an adventure mystery game from the mind of Taisuke Kanasaki, director of the famed Hotel Dusk: Room 215! SK.name: Chase-Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~
SK.description: Chase: Cold Case Investigations ~Distant Memories~ is an adventure mystery game from the mind of Taisuke Kanasaki, director of the famed Hotel Dusk: Room 215! Join the exploits of two gritty detectives whose sense of justice and raw instinct drive them to seek the truth. Put your sleuthing skills to the challenge by re-investigating old crime scenes and solving cold cases by searching for clues and interrogating perps! Find leads by diving head first into old investigation notes, crime scene photos and eye witness reports as you put together all the pieces. Once you have a solid lead, interrogate persons of interest to see what they do (or don't) know. Grill perps by asking tough questions, but be careful! Ask the wrong questions and your Interrogation Gauge will deplete. Ask too many wrong questions and it's Game Over!
